entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. High 19.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Local amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: A few showers ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
